#### `r criteria |> filter(id == .env$id) |> pull(criteria)`

```{r, results = "asis"}
details("What does this mean?",
        here("quarto-docs", "help", paste0("_", id, ".qmd")))
```

```{r}
tagList(
  HTML("<div style=\"line-height:50%;\"><br></div>"),
  form_ui(id, 
          criteria |> filter(id == .env$id) |> pull(criteria), 
          all_options)
)
```
